questionTitle: ________ goes the bus; now we will have to walk!
She is very important to him. He wouldn't get ________ without her.
The Blackhams live in the house ________ the blue door.
I phoned the bank to ________ how much money there was in my account.
Her parents give her anything she asks for, and as a result, she's very ________.
________ I am studying at university and I hope to get a job very soon.
The new secretary in the sales department is a fast typist but her letters are full of spelling ________.
The police have asked that ________ who saw the accident should get in touch with them.
If the greengrocer has some bananas ________ buy some please?
I would like to offer a small ________ to anyone who finds my missing dog.
The Prime Minister has ________ to win the last three General Elections.
You ________ do the washing-up: I can easily do it later.
People demand higher wages because prices are ________ all the time.
You must be careful when you wash this ________ silk blouse.
My father always falls ________ in front of the television.
You can never rely ________ him to be punctual.
Are you interested ________ music?
You must reply ________ his letter.
I shall certainly act ________ your advice.
as sound as ________ = healthy, in good condition (also said of machines).
